test.doc: Verify search employee functionality with different job titles
test.status:
Several failures occurred:
1) Invalid job title: 'QA Engineer'. Valid titles are: ['Account Assistant', 'Sales Representative', 'Social Media Marketer', 'Software Architect', 'Software Engineer', 'Support Specialist', 'VP - Client Services', 'VP - Sales & Marketing']
2) Element 'xpath://input[@placeholder='Username']' not visible after 10 seconds.
3) Element 'xpath://input[@placeholder='Username']' not visible after 10 seconds.
